## Learning Format

I will not be lecturing; **you will be teaching me** by demonstrating concepts live on your machines, answering my questions, and walking me through your PR builds (role reversal is funâ€”think of it as academic karaoke ğŸ¤).

**Important:** I wonâ€™t answer questionsâ€”Iâ€™ll only ask them and request live demos from you (yes, the tables have turned like a well-timed plot twist ğŸ¿).

Expectations

Please come fully prepared; otherwise it may be awkward for you (and memorable for all the wrong reasonsâ€”letâ€™s avoid viral blooper reels ğŸ˜…).

Youâ€™ll explain concepts, field questions, and **teach by building**; the best way to learn is to ship, and shipping is cooler than slides anyway ğŸš€.


First Build: End-to-End Chatbot (Prompt-First, No Hand-Coding)

Your first project will be an **end-to-end chatbot** using:

* **OpenAI Agents SDK**, **Google Gemini**, **Chainlit**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** (yes, weâ€™re going full-stackâ€”like a sundae with extra toppings ğŸ¨).
* **Deployment:** any Kubernetes cloud of your choice (multicloud bragging rights encouraged ğŸ·ï¸).
* **Methodology:** **PFAD**â€”youâ€™ll write **prompts**, not code; the agent does the typing while you do the thinking ğŸ§ .
